Name: fruitstand

Stages.Name: filter
Cmd: for fruit in apple orange banana; do grep $fruit /data/set1.txt | awk '{print $2}' >> /walrus/filter/$fruit; done

Stages.Name: sum
Cmd: for fruit in apple orange banana; do { cat /walrus/filter/$fruit || echo 0; cat /walrus/$fruit; } | awk '{s+=$1} END {print s}' > /walrus/sum/$fruit; done

Comment: Fruit stand example pipeline from Pachyderm
